means: 绿灰色的，覆有白粉的，蓝绿色的

sentence.Network_en: Aggregate long ellipsoid, 13 cm long, 9 cm in diameter ; pericarp with glaucous lenticels.
sentence.Network_cn: 聚合果长椭球形, 长达13厘米, 直径约9厘米,外果皮有苍白色皮孔.

sentence.Network_en: Exception occurred on Glaucous oak with an increase in stem mass ratio under higher light.
sentence.Network_cn: 相对地,对茎、叶部分配比例则减少,惟青刚栎之茎重率有随光量上升而增加的趋势.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek glaukos + -ous

means.word_mean: 1. having a frosted look from a powdery coating, as on plants;

auth_sentence.content: You can tell the difference by the glaucous coating on the Geyer's branches, underneath which the plant has a purplish hue.
